rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTB1010, BTF1010, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200, LAW2100, LAW2102}
Unit was previously coded {AAF1110, AF111, BTC1110, BTF1010, BTP1010, BTW1010, BTW1200, TBC1110}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {AAF1110, AF111, BTC1110, BTF1010, BTP1010, BTW1010, BTW1200, TBC1110}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTB1010, BTF1010, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200, LAW2100, LAW2102}

description: An introduction to legal studies and to the legal system of Australia with special emphasis on commercial aspects. The laws of negligence as it affects business and the professional is introduced, and aspects of the law of contract, consumer law, agency, partnership, trusts and an introduction to companies of relevance to commerce.
